storyInfo: After getting a full grasp of the situation, the Felyne Scholar decides to help deal with the Rathalos. The Roka Village Headman does not take kindly to Yato’s warnings. While treating the villagers, Yato and Noir Corne realize the village is hiding something, and decide to get to the bottom of things.

attributes.content: How did they make this...?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: It has the toughness of Goss Harag Fur, but is as light as Nargacuga Scales...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: And that goes fur the other clothing too, the consistency in quality is meowtstanding!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The strangest thing is pawssibly that... everyone has clothes with tailoring meowch better than what you can get from the best Smithies.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: There's simply no way this area has enough meownsters to provide this much material though...?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: New meowterials! I like them so meowch! And even more in the forest!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: We should lend that long-horned Hunter a paw with the Rathalos!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Purr-haps you might want to rethink that, Smithy! This locale and the New World we were headed to are two completely diffurent places.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The villagers here don't go into the forest to hunt, or craft weapons and armor with meownster materials...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: There's so meowch stuff in this village I've never seen befur, and I have no clue where they came from or how they work.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Though based on what Yato said, some of them seem to be observing the endemic life here, like the members of the Elder Dragon Observation Team or the Ecological Research Center...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: But it's still so diffurent in so meowny aspects!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Diffurent?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Pawsitively! We must figure out a way back as soon as pawssible; I still have a chance to be the purr-ime Ecological Researcher of the New World!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Isn't this a New World too...?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Smithy! Are you saying... this is simply yet another undiscovered New World? More impurr-tantly, one that no other Commission has been to befur?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: No Hunters or Researchers! None of those Elder Dragon Observation Team louts! A totally diffurent, brand new world that only we know of!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: If I can make ampaw recordings of our observations and findings here... I'll be basking in the limelight as a star scholar when we get back!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Those Wyverians buried in their books will be so stunned by my newfound gnawledge—I'm purr-ty clever if I do say so myself!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mrow?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: No, that's not it... I have to think this over carefully.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: We're not the sort to just follow the Hunters all day, and we've already helped them deal with the Rathalos once!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Rathalos! Bang bang!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: I won't prevent mew from going if you really want to, Smithy. I'm just going to wait here and see...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Whoa! Look, guys! Are they Felines?
attributes.name: Curious Child

attributes.content: How could they be Felines when they're this tiny? And so fluffy too... how cute!
attributes.name: Older Child

attributes.content: Hey! What are mew doing!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Whoa, it can speak too! That's so adorable!
attributes.name: Curious Child

attributes.content: Can you play with us, little Feline?
attributes.name: Curious Child

attributes.content: We can carry you and give you pretty clothes to wear.
attributes.name: Curious Child

attributes.content: Or throw you in the air! And catch you! Just like that!
attributes.name: Curious Child

attributes.content: Prepawsterous... you sharp-eared cravens, I hail from the Royal Pawleontology Scriveners and am not your plaything!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Let's try giving it some headpats.
attributes.name: Older Child
Felyne Scholar
attributes.content: Hey! Get your paws off me! I'm warning mew...

attributes.name: Felyne Scholar
attributes.content: Ah... it's so comfurtable...
No, I can't!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Smithy...come back...wait fur me!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I've decided, yes!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Since they've made such a sincere request to use my purrfound expurrtise to deal with the Rathalos...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: As a former Royal Pawleontology Scrivener, my purrfessionalism would never allow me to refuse to lend a paw!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Let us be off, posthaste!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Oh, so you're saying... you came upon a monster the size of a house in the forest near our village? And that it can fly and breathe fire in all directions, and even has venomous claws...
attributes.name: Roka Village Headman

attributes.content: Haha, the forest is truly a wonder.
attributes.name: Roka Village Headman

attributes.content: I understand that you may find that hard to believe, but we saw it with our own eyes. We even fought it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: While I can't confirm that this will escalate into some new kind of crisis, I suggest we immediately notify all the villagers and start evacuating as per standard Catastrophe measures.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: How unfortunate for you to come all this way, only to run into such a troubling matter.
attributes.name: Roka Village Headman

attributes.content: I am called Ataru Takii, the headman of this little Roka village. The peace we enjoy here stems not from me alone, but is thanks to all of our efforts.
attributes.name: Roka Village Headman

attributes.content: Please, have a taste of this tea.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: It's a local specialty of ours, and not only is it refreshing, it can also help speed up recovery.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Don't mind if I do.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Takii, we don't have the luxury of time here.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...I'll take a sip later.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Did you not understand what I said? Only by swiftly evacuating the villagers can we ensure their safety and handle the crisis without any worries.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ah, youth are always in such a rush, but that's not a bad thing. As the saying goes, the early fowlbeast gets the worm.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Please have a seat, you two. We still have time to discuss this in more detail.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Yato, why not hear him out first?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I hope you will carefully consider our proposal and, if conditions permit, fortify the village defenses to ensure everyone is safe during the evacuation.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You mentioned this before, but from where did you come from again? Rho-something...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ah, yes. Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: You must be Operators Yato and Noir Corne, yes? If memory serves me right.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Let me try to recall why I contacted you people back then... Oh yes, you claim to be able to treat Oripathy?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Recently, several families in Roka seem to have gotten infected.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: The Shimanaga, Watazawa, Senno, and Ishidori households... the last one in particular has an especially young child who's contracted Oripathy, and it is heartbreaking to see.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: We are well versed in handling everything related to Oripathy, so you can leave that matter to us.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Of course, and thank you very much for coming, but there remains another small issue nagging at me.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I just can't wrap my head around it, why are you so concerned with the monsters in the forest?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Are you not a pharmaceutical company?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Let me explain. Regional outbreaks of Oripathy often have an underlying cause, and the best way to effectively deal with it is to eliminate the source of Originium dust.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: To be honest, we investigated the mountains earlier and found some clues linking the outbreak to that creature.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Although we can't conclusively prove it yet, prevention is always better than cure.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I see, I see. How meticulous; I'd expect no less of Rhodes Island. I do hope the village youths can learn a thing or two from you.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: I must still insist that you heed our advice to ensure the safety of everyone in the village.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ah, yes. I still have one more question for the both of you though.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Please, go ahead.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...How did you find the tea?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Please don't try to change the subject—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It's pretty good, tasty and invigorating. Way better than the mass-produced bottled stuff you find in bars.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Oh yes, those Mitsumoto bigshots also like it very much.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: So you do business with the Mitsumotos...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We use a very expensive herb called Suzuka to make this blend of tea. It grows near the Soubo mountain range and nowhere else.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: All the Suzuka tea produced in all of Higashi comes from this tiny region you find yourselves in.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Besides that, we also specialize in handcrafted ironwork and ornamental woodcrafts, thanks to the high quality ores and variety of trees we have around here.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: What are you getting at?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: To put it bluntly, only a few years back we were but a tiny hunting village, and our livelihood depended on how well the hunt went.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: We would sing and dance around the campfire when the woods were bountiful, but there were also times when we could count the days our rations would last on one hand, not to mention the ever-present worry of being attacked by beasts at night.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: But these last few years, we've been able to replace our thatched rooves with wood, light up our streets at night, and our children are able to enjoy hot baths every day.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Now, nobody has to go hunting in the mountains, nor worry about tomorrow.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: So to leave our homes over some vague hunch you have... the villagers won't readily accept it.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: I have no intention of making this permanent. Once the situation has been taken care of, you should be able to return.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: And how many days would that take? One? Two? Maybe a month? A year? Can you ensure the village stays intact? That we will be able to return to the lives we have now?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Can Rhodes Island guarantee that?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: As of right now... I'm afraid not. We can't predict the exact scale of the situation, but—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Of course you can't, which is why we won't leave.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: How is the villagers' safety not your top priority?! I can guarantee you that this thing exists, so how can we simply ignore the threat of such a large and dangerous creature?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Are you absolutely sure?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Of what?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We have a saying here: when you see butterflies fluttering in fall, in truth they are but falling leaves.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: We are all too familiar with this forest, Ms. Yato, so perhaps what you think you saw was simply that.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: What are you—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Corne...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We'll go do checkups on the village's Infected, and then arrange a treatment plan based on our findings.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Thank you both, really. But now that you bring up treatment plans... I do have one more small favor to ask of you.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: We're listening.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Could you possibly provide us with some Oripathy-suppressing drugs right now?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: What for...?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: This situation really worries me to no end, even with the two of you here. So just in case a similar outbreak occurs again in the future, I would like us to at least have some medication ready.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Please rest assured, I intend to pay in full for everything.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: There's no need for that, we'll just handle the source of the—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Will it be a bother?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: No... there's no problem, we can give you some right away.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Oh yeah, Headman Takii. I still have a question... You said the village used to make a living through hunting, so are there any hunters still around?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: With no need to hunt, naturally we have no hunters.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: 'Cause I met someone earlier, when we just got here, who looked an awful lot like a hunter. I think he said his name was Kashiwau, do you know who that is?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: A hunter? Ha, in truth even I could call myself a hunter.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: He's pretty old, so he tends to run his mouth. He likes to go to the mountains and swing sticks at trees.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: But... his eccentric personality might cause you some trouble in future, so I think it would be best to stay away from him.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: He doesn't seem to have any family around either, did he get into some kinda trouble?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: You ask interesting questions. He's just the reclusive sort. Every village has one or two of them, it's nothing unusual.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: It's getting late, so why not call it a day here? I wish you both a pleasant stay in our humble abode.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Sorry to bother you.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Ah...right. Just a piece of friendly advice.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Seasoned hunters all know this: the more curious the forest beast, the more easily it falls into a trap.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Do keep that in mind.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: I can only blame myself for underestimating the village's reluctance to evacuate.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It was unwise to try to get them to leave with only the suspicion of danger and no hard evidence.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I think... even if we brought evidence, he still wouldn't believe us that easily.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: He's been refusing to hear us out, and even wants us to stay away from the Rathalos.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Did you stop me earlier because of the way he was acting?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Well, his reason for wanting the drugs was sort of unusual and more than a little fishy, so I figured it'd be faster to just agree and then see what he does.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: As for his parting words... It's hard to see them as anything but a warning.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I don’t care.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Regardless of the attitude of the people here, we have only one duty: to protect them from any threat.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Needless to say, I will find a solution.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: As for you, you care too much.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I just... I just thought Kashiwau was acting a bit too oddly.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I understand your concern, but it has nothing to do with our mission.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Don't waste your energy on irrelevant things.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.text: Ice-cold, on an autumn night in the mountains.
The wind blew through the still-warm body.
It had been bitten, torn apart, chewed on.

attributes.content: Kill them!
Aaaagh—
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Kusso... Just a dream.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I saw you again in it...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Mr. Kashiwau, are you there?
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: Come in...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I brought some onigiri and boiled bamboo shoots, I'll just leave them on the table, okay?
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: I also got some bento boxes from the city, so you can just warm them up and—oh, are you heading out?
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: Yes, I'm going up the mountain.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Are, are you going to deal with that... oversized flying monster those two operators were talking about?
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: I'm just going on a regular hunt.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Then... can I just say... I've been preparing for this day, and now that a super powerful monster has appeared, it's time I finally became a proper hunter.
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: Look, I have a bow, leather hiking boots, and a knife. I'm healthy and pretty strong.
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: So... can I come hunting with you?
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: What... can't you at least think it over?
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: I can help you with a lot of things, like carrying your hunting spear, setting up traps, carrying pelts down the mountain...
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: You're too young for that, kid. With no experience, you'll only slow me down.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'm not a kid anymore! Back in the day, children my age would already be out hunting, there's no way you don't know that.
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: I'll be good and stay out of trouble!
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: That's enough from you.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Everyone says... there are no more hunters in the village....*sob*
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: Hunters defeat the beasts in the forest, and are the strongest heroes of the village, like you.
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: It's obvious that you've been protecting everyone the whole time, so why do they talk about you like that?
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: They even say you're not a real hunter, just a doddering old man who goes up the mountain to get his bones chewed on by beasts...
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: They said...*sigh*
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: The forest... becomes more dangerous by the day.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: It's no longer safe for anyone to set foot in.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: They... They were lying, right Mr. Kashiwau? You're a real hunter, right?
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: I'll take care of that monster and return. Believe me.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Alright, enough crying.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Though it may be too early for you now, I still believe that one day you'll be a real hunter.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: This is a promise between the two of us, alright?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yeah... promise.
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: Huh? Why are all the villagers coming out?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Raise your hands, yes, like that.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Don't be afraid, I'm just taking a quick look.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Alright, good girl.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Next please.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The old hunter lingered for a moment, and was about to turn away.
Then the young operator happened to glance sideways, and they met eyes for an instant.
Hmph...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Can I ask... how's my health? I've been getting a lot of headaches lately.
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: Don't worry, it's nothing serious.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Here are some painkillers. No need to take one daily, just whenever you feel severe pain.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: Yato, you should come check out the angiography results.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Alright... please wait a moment, I'll be back right away for the rest of the consultation.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Do you see this?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: How could this be...?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Sorry to have kept you waiting, but I have a question to ask.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Actually, there have been some slight changes detected in your condition. Have you encountered anything unusual lately? Or visited any places you don't normally go?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ah! Is... Is it serious?
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: Not for now, but if you continue to be exposed to active Originium and develop Oripathy, dealing with the consequences won't be easy.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It doesn't even have to be recently, but please try and recall if you've had any unusual encounters, especially with Originium.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Active Originium...? But how? They said I was properly protected when I went in.
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: Went in? Where?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Narumatsu! Don't say things that will make the doctor misunderstand.
attributes.name: Strict Villager

attributes.content: I, I'm just a blacksmith... how could I possibly have been exposed to Originium, there must be some sort of mistake.
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: Indeed, our village is fairly disciplined, so there shouldn't be any cause for concern here, Doctor.
attributes.name: Strict Villager

attributes.content: ...I understand. Please be careful to stay away from areas that might be contaminated with active Originium, and not to touch any suspicious objects in the future.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That was the last one.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Find out anything new?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: They've all been saying the same things, either that they never leave the village or nothing at all.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Using the possibility of contracting Oripathy as a scare tactic hasn't been effective. The moment you ask about anything other than their condition, or ask where they've been, they immediately put up their guard.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Although only a few individuals were diagnosed with acute Oripathy and were instructed on how to properly deal with it, we cannot underestimate the extent to which Oripathy has affected the village as a whole.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The results you showed me earlier... Were the rest of them similar?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: If they haven't been in contact with Originium recently, then where did the outbreak come from?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: According to the angiogram results, the villagers have been exposed to active Originium for at least a few years.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Only in trace amounts, though, resulting in vague symptoms and only a few that have actually contracted Oripathy.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: It's due to limited exposure to an extremely low concentration of Originium particles, I think.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Was it at the same level we detected in the Rathalos's scratch marks?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: No... that was high enough to induce Oripathy outright and is probably related to the few villagers who did contract the disease. They also mentioned they went into the forest.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: (Breathes deeply)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Let's see. If this area has been under continuous exposure to Originium, and then one day it suddenly spiked, could it be that...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Both sources of Originium... come from the same place?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Very likely.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hello there.
attributes.name: Strict Villager

attributes.content: You're from earlier.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Excuse me, I should have introduced myself. I am called Hiroshi Ritou, and my family has lived here for many generations.
attributes.name: Strict Villager

attributes.content: Hello. Do you need something from us?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I hope the two of you can forgive me for interrupting your inquiry earlier, I was simply worried that he had misspoken in public, which could have consequences.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Consequences? What do you mean?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ah, because of a certain matter in this village... many people have dirty laundry they'd rather not air.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Y-You two! Are you the visiting doctors?
attributes.name: Anxious Villager

attributes.content: Um... we can only examine for Oripathy.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What's got you in such a hurry?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Ah, could it be...?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Please! You have to save the Ishidoris' boy!
attributes.name: Anxious Villager

attributes.content: I'm his neighbor, and he's really sick... He keeps on vomiting blood.
attributes.name: Anxious Villager

attributes.content: Vomiting blood?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That sounds serious, we'd better get going.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll come with you.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Pass the drainage tube.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Pliers! Quickly!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Gauze!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough* *cough*—
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Phew—we succeeded. Luckily, we've dealt with a similar situation before.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yeah, I remember that. Back then, you were doing it to yourself...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I take it your idle chatter means you need more to do? Go give him a suppressant shot.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Doctor... will he be okay?
attributes.name: Anxious Villager

attributes.content: He's out of danger.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: There was bleeding in his lungs, and being in the wrong posture caused a blood clot to clog up his airways... Make sure he sits up properly and gets ample rest.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Thank goodness.
attributes.name: Anxious Villager

attributes.content: It's too early to breathe easy, things aren't looking very well for him.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: His infection has been the most severe we've seen so far here, though fortunately he got a suppressant shot just in time.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: But that will only slow the symptoms, and will have to be followed up with more shots. He might even need to be brought back to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: But to be in this condition... what exactly did he come into contact with?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I don't know, there shouldn't have been anything...
attributes.name: Anxious Villager

attributes.content: That doesn't make sense. What about his family?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I don't know either...
attributes.name: Anxious Villager

attributes.content: What exactly are you all hiding?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: *sleep talking* Papa...
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: *sleep talking* Papa, would... never lie...
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: *sleep talking* Monster... Giant monster...
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: A monster?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You can't say that!
attributes.name: Anxious Villager

attributes.content: Ahhh! Miss, please don't get any closer!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Corne, keep her in check.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: My throat... water...
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Here you go—careful, drink it slowly.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: *gulping*
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: I'm here to help, so don't be afraid.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Where's your family?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Papa, he... got taken away by the village headman soon after he came back from the cave.
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: What cave?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Child! You mustn't speak of that to outsiders! This only concerns—
attributes.name: Anxious Villager

attributes.content: Shut up! Can it be any more important than a child's life?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Papa... He would go into the cave every morning, and come back late at night.
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: But yesterday... *cough*... there was a loud noise from the cave.
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: The village headman said... he needed people to take a look... So Papa went in, and got a fever when he came back... and had rocks growing on him.
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Oripathy worsens rapidly.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Sounds like he might have come into direct contact with active Originium and gotten some of it on his body, causing the boy's condition to deteriorate too.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Papa said, there are big monsters in the cave and it's not safe... but the village headman said he was lying, so nobody believed him... and then he got taken away.
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: He would never lie... never...
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: There, there. He wasn't lying. We... saw a monster with our own eyes.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Really...?
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Yes, but don't worry. We're very strong, and won't let the monster harm the village.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Can you defeat it, lady...? And protect the village... Papa didn't lie...
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Mm... I give you my word. As captain of Rhodes Island Op Team A4, I, Operator Yato, accept your commission.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: And I never break my promises.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Now that's enough talking, you need to get some more rest, okay?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Step aside, Corne.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You... You should have seen that kid's condition earlier, right?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Many of the villagers have been infected, and if the source of the Originium dust isn't taken care of, you will all contract Oripathy, and things will only get worse from there.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The next person to end up like this will be you! Am I clear?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: So tell me what exactly it is you're all hiding!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Sorry, I can't...
attributes.name: Anxious Villager

attributes.content: Let her go, she had no choice. Perhaps it's better that I explain.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Please leave, I'll talk to them.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Anxious Villager

attributes.content: Finally talking?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The cave the boy mentioned... It's in the mountain behind the village. Many villagers work down there under the village headman.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: What's inside?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I don't work there, so I don't know. And even if I did know, I wouldn't be able to talk about it, just like she couldn't.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: So the village headman is the one making sure everyone keeps their mouths shut?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Well, I didn't say that.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: ...Please take care of the child. In the meantime, I'll go clarify matters with the headman.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Wait, are you sure about that?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: If the situation isn't resolved, the village will only be in more danger!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: And do you really think he'll tell you the truth? You'll only get ambiguous answers and end up even further from a solution.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: He's right, Yato.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I know where it is.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: This is the place he mentioned, and I already scouted out the area. There aren't many houses on this side of the village, and the terrain is pretty wack, so that doesn't seem suspicious at first glance.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Over there, there are two villagers chatting like they're just taking a break out behind the mountain.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: But it's obvious that they keep glancing at that one house over there.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'll take them down, and you go take a look inside.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Wait, what if we mess this up?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Knock out two innocent villagers and they'll definitely kick us out of the village.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Smithy here has an idea fur mew!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Whoa, where did you guys come from?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: We've decided to come help mew two with the Rathalos, so you should be on your hindpaws thanking us fur the assistance!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: So you think you can lure them away?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I don't think anything, Smithy's the one with the idea.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Yato, let's leave it to them, and the both of us can sneak in from the back.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Smithy... Is this idea of yours really going to work?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: And where did all these ingredients come from?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Chop! Stir! No stopping meow!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Ahhh, how appawlling!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I, a furmer Royal Pawleontology Scrivener, destined to be the most amazing researcher of the New World...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Am not some ordinary canteen chef!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Turn it over! It's done! Well done!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Is it time for dinner yet?
attributes.name: Starving Villager

attributes.content: What are you talking about? The sun hasn't even set yet.
attributes.name: Strong Villager

attributes.content: I didn't have breakfast or lunch today, not even a snack...
attributes.name: Starving Villager

attributes.content: Ever since those two outsiders arrived, the headman stationed me here to keep an eye out, so I haven't had the chance to get a bite.
attributes.name: Starving Villager

attributes.content: I'm so hungry...
attributes.name: Starving Villager

attributes.content: Can you keep a lid on it? You're not the only one who's hungry here.
attributes.name: Strong Villager

attributes.content: Hey, do you think those two will really come looking? Haven't they been busy treating the villagers?
attributes.name: Starving Villager

attributes.content: Just follow the headman's orders and stay put.
attributes.name: Strong Villager

attributes.content: Do you want what happened with that girl to happen again? She turned the village upside down back then.
attributes.name: Strong Villager

attributes.content: Fine, fine, I'll hold it in.
attributes.name: Starving Villager

attributes.content: Wait, what's that smell?
attributes.name: Starving Villager

attributes.content: Smell? What smell—Ah!
attributes.name: Strong Villager

attributes.content: Perfectly roasted meat, melted grease bubbling over the vegetables, and the sweet scent of roasted fruit... I've never smelled anything like it before!
attributes.name: Starving Villager

attributes.content: (*salivating*)
attributes.name: Strong Villager

attributes.content: Just stop talking, I can smell it too, you know...
attributes.name: Strong Villager

attributes.content: C'mon, let's take a look, maybe someone's brought us food.
attributes.name: Starving Villager

attributes.content: You go. I'll wait here.
attributes.name: Strong Villager

attributes.content: Are you sure? Didn't you say you were hungry too?
attributes.name: Starving Villager

attributes.content: ...Just a quick look.
attributes.name: Strong Villager

attributes.content: Mrrow! A nutritious and energizing meal pawmade by Felynes, purrfect fur dinner!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: A table fur two, purrhaps?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Strong Villager

attributes.content: Ah, they're—
attributes.name: Starving Villager

attributes.content: Smithy! We have customeows!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Okay! I'm... I'm standing still, right here.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Be gentler when you step on m—ouch!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Is this the cave the kid was talking about?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It doesn't seem natural. There are signs of excavation work all along the walls.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: They even laid tracks on the ground... These prints look pretty fresh too, so they must have used it recently.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The entrance to the cave was sealed when we came in, and it didn't look like they closed it for us... but to keep something in.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Given what the Ishidori kid said, there was probably an accident here recently... Do you think the tracks might lead us closer to the Rathalos?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: We'll know once we go deeper in.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What's that up ahead?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Wait, don't move!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll go take a looksee.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Slow down, you... Be careful.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: No problemo, it doesn't seem to be alive.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Burnt clothing... Looks like it was taken off before it caught fire.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: There's more over there.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: A helmet and portable flashlight... Maybe that kid's dad left it here.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: There's a ventilation shaft just up ahead. He probably left his things here and tried to escape through the shaft but failed.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: So he was running away, and probably really nervous.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: This hole is big enough to house a Rathalos, so most likely...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Corne, go test the burnt clothes.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I've got the results. There's traces of active Originium, in a similar concentration to the sample we got from the scratch marks in the forest, but slightly higher.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: ...Do you smell anything strange, Yato?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Blood, from up ahead.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll go take a looksee.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: This is... a piece of meat?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Huge chunks of meatbeast, and fresh too. Probably left here shortly before we came in.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Seems like they dragged it down here, but why?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Maybe to attract some kind of carnivore? Ah...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Attract... the Rathalos!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Mraaa!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Mwaagh!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mraaaahh!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Stupid long-horned Hunter! What are mew shouting for!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Because you guys just jumped out without any warning!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Ah... that particular smell again...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: We purrfectly distracted those guards and there was so meowch left over!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: We knocked them out cold!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: So it ended up like the original plan anyway... Wait, leftover what?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Don't mew mind it... just keep going!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: We'll be here for a bit, there's a lot of investigating to do.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: They're going to catch up with mew.
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Huh... what's going to catch up?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: People.
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Why would there be people down here?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Is it not purrfectly normal for people to try and catch mew if you sneak into their place?!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Even if Smithy didn't pilfur their kitchens, mew would have been discovered eventually.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: What on Terra is going on here?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Everyone, shut up.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Listen.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The sound is apurr-oaching!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: They're going to catch up with us!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: No... that sound is...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Coming from within the cave.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Infected creatures!
attributes.name: Yato
